Package Server.Model.LivingRoom.CommonGoal

Class RowColumnGoal

java.lang.Object
Server.Model.LivingRoom.CommonGoal.CommonGoal
Server.Model.LivingRoom.CommonGoal.RowColumnGoal
public class RowColumnGoal extends CommonGoal
The RowColumnGoal class represents a goal where players must create row or column of tile with a different pattern. It extends the CommonGoal class and contains a number of columns, the number of rows, and the max number of tile different for column/row.

  • Constructor Details

    • RowColumnGoal

      public RowColumnGoal(List<Integer> tokenList, @NotNull @NotNull com.google.gson.JsonObject jsonObject)
      Create a new RowColumnGoal instance with the provided token list and JSON object.
      Parameters:
      tokenList - The list of scoring tokens wearable by players, based on how many players are in the game.
      jsonObject - The JSON object containing the properties for this objective. It must have "enum," "description," "numColumn", "numRow", and "maxDifferent" properties.
      Throws:
      NullPointerException - if the jsonObject parameter is null.

  • Method Details

    • check

      public void check(Player player) throws NullPlayerException
      Checks if a player has achieved the RowColumnGoal and updates his score accordingly. If the player has achieved the goal, their ID is saved in the "accomplished" attribute.
      Specified by:
      check in class CommonGoal
      Parameters:
      player - The player to check for RowColumnGoal achievement.
      Throws:
      NullPlayerException - if the player parameter is null.
